title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: A novel about the serious issues of race, inequality, and segregation through the eyes of young Scout Finch.

author: George Orwell
description: A chilling dystopian novel about the dangers of totalitarianism.

title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: A tragic story of love, wealth, and the American Dream.
